meanings.definition: The act of repairing or modifying firearms.
meanings.sent1: Gunsmithing requires skill and precision to fix guns.
meanings.sent2: I took a course in gunsmithing to learn how to repair rifles.
meanings.sent3: After some gunsmithing, the old shotgun looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: His gunsmithing transformed the broken pistol into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate gunsmithing process involves careful handling of gun parts.

meanings.definition: The profession or trade of repairing or modifying firearms.
meanings.sent1: Gunsmithing is a respected profession that requires specialized knowledge.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather worked in gunsmithing for over 30 years.
meanings.sent3: The town's only gunsmithing shop always has a long waiting list.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gunsmithing, reputation is everything.
meanings.sent5: She decided to pursue a career in gunsmithing after discovering her passion for firearms.
